text: The Charge of the Light Brigade is a 1936 American adventure movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was based on the 1854 poem of the same name by Alfred, Lord Tennyson. It stars Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Patric Knowles, Henry Stephenson, Nigel Bruce, Donald Crisp, David Niven, Spring Byington and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1937 and was remade in 1968. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 adventure movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz Category:Movies set in the 1850s
title: The Charge of the Light Brigade (1936 movie)
